alert.note: Alert for Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 5:35PM CST until January 11 at 10:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...In New Mexico, East Central Tularosa Basin/Alamogordo and Southeast Tularosa Basin. In Texas, Western El Paso County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
